alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 2:36PM CST until January 16 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 11 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain expected. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 above zero. * WHERE...In Louisiana, West Cameron Parish. In Texas, Lower Jefferson County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to midnight CST tonight. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to 11 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. In Louisiana, call 511 for road information. In Texas, visit www.drivetexas.org for road information.
